meanings.definition: Not broadcasted or transmitted through radio or television.
meanings.sent1: The nonbroadcast message was only meant for a few people to hear.
meanings.sent2: The nonbroadcast signal was not meant for public consumption.
meanings.sent3: The nonbroadcast announcement was like a secret whispered in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The nonbroadcast event was a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The nonbroadcast news was like a hidden treasure waiting to be found.

meanings.definition: A program or content that is not intended for public viewing or listening.
meanings.sent1: The nonbroadcast show was only available to a select few.
meanings.sent2: The nonbroadcast documentary was not meant for general audiences.
meanings.sent3: The nonbroadcast film was like a private screening for VIPs.
meanings.sent4: The nonbroadcast podcast was a hidden gem in the sea of content.
meanings.sent5: The nonbroadcast interview was a rare glimpse into a private world.

meanings.definition: To not distribute or share information through traditional media channels.
meanings.sent1: They decided to nonbroadcast the sensitive information to avoid public scrutiny.
meanings.sent2: The company chose to nonbroadcast the details of the internal meeting.
meanings.sent3: She nonbroadcasted the news to keep it within a close circle of friends.
meanings.sent4: The team agreed to nonbroadcast their strategy to maintain a competitive edge.
meanings.sent5: He nonbroadcasted the announcement to prevent leaks to the press.
